---

```{r}
a = 1
foo = function(x) {
  a + x
}
foo(0)

bar = function(x) {
  a = 2
  foo(x)
}
bar(0)

foo2 = function(x) {
  a = get("a", envir = parent.frame())
  a + x
}
foo2(0)

bar2 = function(x) {
  a = 2
  foo2(x)
}
bar2(0)

deep = function(x) {
  foo2(x)
}
deep(0)

```
